import React from 'react' import { Card, CardMedia, CardActions, CardContent, Typography, Button } from '@material-ui/core' import ThumbUpAlt from '@material-ui/icons/ThumbDownAlt' import MoreHorizIcon from '@material-ui/icons/MoreHoriz' import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Delete' import moment from 'moment' import useStyles from './styles' const Post = ({ post }) => { const classes = useStyles() return (
{post.creator} {moment(post.createdAt).fromNow()}
) } export default Post
